column4: Hey, I'm having an annoying problem on my netbook. I don't know how it's happening or what key I may or may not be hitting or if my touchpad is doing something odd but, what ever I had copied seems to somehow insert itself into whatever text field i'm typing in, as if there's some type of middle button being pressed
I've read that you might be able to make the left button do middle click, since tapping the pad does a left click already
I'm not interested in middle clicks
